Builder

Moduleembedthis.me
Definition class Builder
InheritanceBuilder Object
StabilityPrototype.

The Builder Class implements the core building functions for MakeMe.

Properties

QualifiersPropertyTypeDescription
static const ALL Default goal to build all. Set to 'all'.
static const TargetsToBuildByDefault List of targets to build by default. Defaults to 'exe', 'file', 'lib' and 'header'.
static const TargetsToClean List of targets to clean by default. Defaults to 'exe', 'file', 'lib' and 'obj'.
goalStringCurrent goal.
localPlatformStringLocal platform string of the form OS-ARCH-PROFILE.
topTargetsArrayTop-level targets to build.

Builder Class Methods

(No own class methods defined)

Method Detail

build(goals: Array = expression)
Description
Build all required targets for the requested goals.
Parameters
goals: Array null [default: expression]
mapLibPaths(libpaths: Array, base: Path = expression): String
Description
Map library paths to a base.
Parameters
libpaths: Array Array of library search paths.
base: Path Base directory from which the paths should be resolved. Defaults to the current directory. [default: expression]
Returns
Linker library search path options.
run(command, copt = expression): String
Description
Run a command and trace output if copt.show or options.show.
Parameters
command Command to run. May be an array of args or a string.
copt Options. These are also passed to Cmd. [default: expression]
Options
dirChange to given directory to run the command.
filterDo not display output to the console if it contains the specified filter pattern. Set to true to filter (not display) any output. Note the command always returns the command output as the function result.
generateGenerate in projects. Defaults to true.
noshowDo not show the command line before executing. Useful to override me --show for one command.
nostopContinue processing even if this command is not successful.
showShow the command line before executing. Similar to me --show, but operates on just this command.
timeoutTimeout for the command to complete Note: do not use the Cmd options: noio, detach. Use Cmd APIs directly.
watch(start: Path, goals = expression)
Description
Watch for changes and rebuild as required. The sleep period is defined via --watch.
Parameters
goals null [default: expression]
whyRebuild(path: Path, tag: String, msg: String)
Description
Emit trace for me --why on why a target is being rebuilt.
Parameters
path: Path Target path being considered.
tag: String Informational tag emitted before the message.
msg: String Message to display.
whySkip(name: String, msg: String)
Description
Emit trace for me --why on why a target is being skipped.
Parameters
name: String Target path being considered.
msg: String Message to display.
